actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution designating September 2023 as "Macedonian American Heritage Month" and celebrating the language, history, and culture of Macedonian Americans and their incredible contributions to the United States.

summary.text: This resolution designates September 2023 as Macedonian American Heritage Month and recognizes the contributions of Macedonian Americans to the United States in various fields.

titles.title: A resolution designating September 2023 as "Macedonian American Heritage Month" and celebrating the language, history, and culture of Macedonian Americans and their incredible contributions to the United States.
